text: Awon oluronupiwada, awon olujosin (fun Allahu), awon oludupe (fun Allahu), awon alaaawe, awon oludawote-orunkun (lori irun), awon oluforikanle (fun Allahu), awon olupase-ohun rere, awon oluko-ohun buruku ati awon oluso-enu-ala ti Allahu gbekale, fun awon onigbagbo ododo (wonyi) ni iro idunnu (Ogba Idera)
